title: erroneous card select w/ omni filter
description:
two scenarios spotted

if i filter cards down with omnibar:

1. highlight a card
2. click another card
3. press cmd + enter to close that card

then the highlighted card comes up at the same time as the other one opens. Not desired.

I don't think cmd + enter should ever bring up a card.

the other scenario is, after filtering, you use a + New Card button, type a title in, and press enter, then the highlighted card comes up
creator: Alexander Terp
